messages.message: @Subash @Aayush converse-app is failing in CI and sandbox because it's consistently timing out (40sec) after sending a query. CI example: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11781/overview/54aefd14-d65b-4aa7-a7df-[…]eplay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1719588122494.7 (https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11781/overview/54aefd14-d65b-4aa7-a7df-70b4c4b26820/replay?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1&ts=1719588122494.7), sandbox example: https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/11780/test-results/8a6de32b-eb7f-4d12-a01c-e5554ee14d51/replay. Could this be a real failure?
Converse billing is also failing for the same reason.
I'm pretty sure this is a real bug, I can't send queries on sandbox or crafting but UAT and prod work fine. Posted in <#C06731WJTUP|>
Hmm I can reproduce this
cc <!subteam^S05BKH20B4K> - for visibility
Seems like this is probably a backend issue - @Aayush who's the best person (who's still online :persevere:) to get on this?

I was able to run queries a few hours ago (probably last/last to last deployment).

@Vasu any ideas?
The tests on sandbox were passing at 11:30am IST, and were failing by 2:30pm IST
this looks like is timing out in the model service (not in api-server)

I see this (https://aihub-sandbox.internal.instabase.com/grafana/goto/9ei3ybQIg?orgId=1) error coming from within ibllm. The most recent related change was this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/commit/0b6b826b04a9083deeb4da06d66e5a749726c60d) commit, @Sławek Biel @jordy.vlan Could this be related, could you help?
@lydia @mfichman I see you two were also reviewers, since it's late in other timezones can you all take a look at this? Seems like this is a real bug and it's causing our Cypress tests to fail.
Maybe this PR needs to be merged? https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59323 @Vishnu too since you're a reviewer on this one
That will solve it, except for test_reasoning_prompt_suggestions
okay, lets merge it then. i can add a separate PR for the integration test fixes. this will at least stop the CI failures.
Yes
There's an outage with Github CI, so the final status isn't being reported :weary: I'll keep an eye on it and merge it when the outage is over!
it keeps saying I cannot squash and merge, if someone else can do it, go ahead :slightly_smiling_face:
Yeah it's because of the github outage. I know it's late for you all so I can merge it once we're able to!
Merged!
awesome, thanks Jessica! :thanks-3543:
@Vishnu Got home, fixed a separate PR for the reasoning prompt tests :wink: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59357 :wink:
